english.segment1: the red follow pink. voices and eyes trembling tell you. of my stance, one last glance. on the brink. intellect flees its cell. so long now, I'll swallow whole. or utter stillborn sentiment. she knows how. for she taught me. but could it be me that was wrong?. she summons a tear. as all her efforts decay. years reverse, it's much worse. than she fears. her firstborn inveighs
